ITS A FKN RACKET! \n\nOriginal Review: Member' when Star Wars movies were more about substance and plot than pretty colors and slap-stick humor? I can't believe we went from Rogue One (possibly my favorite Star Wars movie ever) to this heaping pile of garbage. The only reason I would even contemplate ever watching it again is so that I can make a 10 page list of all the things I hated about it. Literally there are so many layers of suck in this movie that I even\, until about 10 minutes ago\, completely forgot about the Casino scene. The only reason I am not telling all of my friends not to see a movie they have waited 2 years for is because\, for some reason\, I want them to endure the same pain that I just witnessed. I don't want to feel all alone here in the fetal position after trying to wash the stench off in my shower. This movie is the Crystal Skull of the Star Wars franchise.
